text: WGTC-LP (92.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Mayhew, Mississippi. The station is owned by East Mississippi Community College, and airs a top 40 format. The station was assigned the WGTC-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on December 30, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * GTC-LP GTC-LP GTC-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Mississippi Category:Contemporary hit radio stations in the United States Category:Lowndes County, Mississippi
title: WGTC-LP
